duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage SAP Finance & Controlling (FICO) implementation in a manufacturing environment.
Work with SMEs and end-users to determine functional requirements within SAP Finance & Controlling areas.
Configure FI & CO modules in SAP to meet business requirements and facilitate design session workshops.
Provide leadership and guidance to other systems analysts, business teams, and implementation partner resources.
Establish the SAP COE by developing best practices, documentation, and benchmarks in the FICO domain.
Support cutover activities, training, and post go live support.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering, or equivalent discipline (Master's preferred)
